effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.
name: stench
description: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

effect: Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
name: drizzle
description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

effect: Raises Speed one stage after each turn.
name: speed-boost
description: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

effect: Protects against critical hits.
name: battle-armor
description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.
name: sturdy
description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.

effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
name: damp
description: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.

effect: Prevents paralysis.
name: limber
description: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.

effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.
name: sand-veil
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.

effect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.
name: static
description: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.

effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.
name: volt-absorb
description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.
name: water-absorb
description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of taking damage.

effect: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.
name: oblivious
description: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.
name: cloud-nine
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3×.
name: compound-eyes
description: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.

effect: Prevents sleep.
name: insomnia
description: The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.

effect: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.
name: color-change
description: The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move used on it.

effect: Prevents poison.
name: immunity
description: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.

effect: Protects against fire moves. Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.
name: flash-fire
description: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.

effect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.
name: shield-dust
description: This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

effect: Prevents confusion.
name: own-tempo
description: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.

effect: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.
name: suction-cups
description: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.
name: intimidate
description: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.
name: shadow-tag
description: This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s shadow to prevent it from escaping.

effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.
name: rough-skin
description: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.

effect: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.
name: wonder-guard
description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

effect: Evades ground moves.
name: levitate
description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.
name: effect-spore
description: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.

effect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.
name: synchronize
description: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.

effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.
name: clear-body
description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

effect: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.
name: natural-cure
description: All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.

effect: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pokémon where possible. Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.
name: lightning-rod
description: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.
name: serene-grace
description: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.

effect: Doubles Speed during rain.
name: swift-swim
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

effect: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.
name: chlorophyll
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

effect: Doubles the wild encounter rate.
name: illuminate
description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.

effect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.
name: trace
description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.

effect: Doubles Attack in battle.
name: huge-power
description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.
name: poison-point
description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

effect: Prevents flinching.
name: inner-focus
description: The Pokémon’s intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.

effect: Prevents freezing.
name: magma-armor
description: The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

effect: Prevents burns.
name: water-veil
description: The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.
name: magnet-pull
description: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.

effect: Protects against sound-based moves.
name: soundproof
description: Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.

effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.
name: rain-dish
description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

effect: Summons a sandstorm that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
name: sand-stream
description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.
name: pressure
description: By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.

effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.
name: thick-fat
description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.
name: early-bird
description: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.

effect: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.
name: flame-body
description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.
name: run-away
description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

effect: Prevents accuracy from being lowered.
name: keen-eye
description: Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon’s accuracy.

effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.
name: hyper-cutter
description: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items. May also pick up an item after battle.
name: pickup
description: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

effect: Skips every second turn.
name: truant
description: The Pokémon can’t use a move the following turn if it uses one.

effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.
name: hustle
description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.
name: cute-charm
description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.
name: plus
description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.
name: minus
description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

effect: Changes castform's type and form to match the weather.
name: forecast
description: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

effect: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.
name: sticky-hold
description: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

effect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.
name: shed-skin
description: The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
name: guts
description: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat.

effect: Increases Defense to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
name: marvel-scale
description: The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.

effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.
name: liquid-ooze
description: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.

effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
name: overgrow
description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
name: blaze
description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

effect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
name: torrent
description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
name: swarm
description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.

effect: Protects against recoil damage.
name: rock-head
description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

effect: Summons strong sunlight that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
name: drought
description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out. Eluded by flying-types and Pokémon in the air.
name: arena-trap
description: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.

effect: Prevents sleep.
name: vital-spirit
description: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.
name: white-smoke
description: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

effect: Doubles Attack in battle.
name: pure-power
description: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

effect: Protects against critical hits.
name: shell-armor
description: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.
name: air-lock
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

effect: Doubles evasion when confused.
name: tangled-feet
description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

effect: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.
name: motor-drive
description: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.
name: rivalry
description: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

effect: Raises Speed one stage upon flinching.
name: steadfast
description: The Pokémon’s determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.

effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail. Protects against hail damage.
name: snow-cloak
description: Boosts evasion in a hailstorm.

effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.
name: gluttony
description: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

effect: Raises Attack to the maximum of six stages upon receiving a critical hit.
name: anger-point
description: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

effect: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.
name: unburden
description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon’s held item is used or lost.

effect: Halves damage from fire moves and burns.
name: heatproof
description: The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.

effect: Doubles the Pokémon's stat modifiers. These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.
name: simple
description: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.

effect: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain. Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.
name: dry-skin
description: Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

effect: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.
name: download
description: Compares an opposing Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

effect: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.
name: iron-fist
description: Powers up punching moves.

effect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.
name: poison-heal
description: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned, instead of losing HP.

effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.
name: adaptability
description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

effect: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and triple kick to their full length every time.
name: skill-link
description: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.

effect: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
name: hydration
description: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.

effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.
name: solar-power
description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.

effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
name: quick-feet
description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

effect: Makes the Pokémon's moves all act normal-type.
name: normalize
description: All the Pokémon’s moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

effect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.
name: sniper
description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.

effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.
name: magic-guard
description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

effect: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.
name: no-guard
description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

effect: Makes the Pokémon move last within its move's priority bracket.
name: stall
description: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.
name: technician
description: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.

effect: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.
name: leaf-guard
description: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

effect: Prevents the Pokémon from using its held item in battle.
name: klutz
description: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.
name: mold-breaker
description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

effect: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.
name: super-luck
description: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.
name: aftermath
description: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.

effect: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective move, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit KO move.
name: anticipation
description: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

effect: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.
name: forewarn
description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.
name: unaware
description: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon’s stat changes.

effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.
name: tinted-lens
description: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.

effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.
name: filter
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

effect: Halves Attack and Speed for five turns upon entering battle.
name: slow-start
description: For five turns, the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed stats are halved.

effect: Lets the Pokémon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokémon.
name: scrappy
description: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

effect: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pokémon where possible. Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.
name: storm-drain
description: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail. Protects against hail damage.
name: ice-body
description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.
name: solid-rock
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

effect: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
name: snow-warning
description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

effect: The Pokémon may pick up honey after battle.
name: honey-gather
description: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.
name: frisk
description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.

effect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.
name: reckless
description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

effect: Changes arceus's type and form to match its held Plate.
name: multitype
description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.

effect: Increases friendly Pokémon's Attack and Special Defense to 1.5× during strong sunlight.
name: flower-gift
description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies in harsh sunlight.

effect: Damages sleeping opponents for 1/8 their max HP after each turn.
name: bad-dreams
description: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.

effect: Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.
name: pickpocket
description: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

effect: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.
name: sheer-force
description: Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.

effect: Inverts stat changes.
name: contrary
description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.
name: unnerve
description: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

effect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.
name: defiant
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

effect: Halves Attack and Special Attack at 50% max HP or less.
name: defeatist
description: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.

effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.
name: cursed-body
description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

effect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.
name: healer
description: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.

effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.
name: friend-guard
description: Reduces damage done to allies.

effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
name: weak-armor
description: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.

effect: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.
name: heavy-metal

effect: Halves the Pokémon's weight.
name: light-metal
description: Halves the Pokémon’s weight.

effect: Halves damage taken from full HP.
name: multiscale
description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.

effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× when poisoned.
name: toxic-boost
description: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.

effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when burned.
name: flare-boost
description: Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon is burned.

effect: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.
name: harvest
description: May create another Berry after one is used.

effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.
name: telepathy
description: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.

effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.
name: moody
description: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

effect: Protects against damage from weather.
name: overcoat
description: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.

effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.
name: poison-touch
description: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

effect: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.
name: regenerator
description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

effect: Protects against Defense drops.
name: big-pecks
description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.

effect: Doubles Speed during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.
name: sand-rush
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.

effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.
name: wonder-skin
description: Makes status moves more likely to miss.

effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.
name: analytic
description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

effect: Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokémon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.
name: illusion
description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party’s last spot.

effect: Transforms upon entering battle.
name: imposter
description: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.

effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
name: infiltrator
description: Passes through the opposing Pokémon’s barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.

effect: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.
name: mummy
description: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.

effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.
name: moxie
description: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.

effect: Raises Attack one stage upon taking damage from a dark move.
name: justified
description: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the Pokémon, for justice.

effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.
name: rattled
description: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.

effect: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.
name: magic-bounce
description: Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.

effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.
name: sap-sipper
description: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move, instead of taking damage.

effect: Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.
name: prankster
description: Gives priority to a status move.

effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.
name: sand-force
description: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.
name: iron-barbs
description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.

effect: Changes darmanitan's form after each turn depending on its HP: Zen Mode below 50% max HP, and Standard Mode otherwise.
name: zen-mode
description: Changes the Pokémon’s shape when HP is half or less.

effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.
name: victory-star
description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.
name: turboblaze

effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.
name: teravolt
description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
name: aroma-veil
description: Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

effect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.
name: flower-veil
description: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

description: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.
name: protean
description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.

effect: Halves damage from physical attacks.
name: fur-coat
description: Halves the damage from physical moves.

effect: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
name: magician
description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
name: bulletproof
description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
name: competitive
description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
name: strong-jaw
description: The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
name: refrigerate
description: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

effect: Prevents friendly Pokémon from sleeping.
name: sweet-veil
description: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

effect: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.
name: stance-change
description: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King’s Shield.

effect: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.
name: gale-wings
description: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the  Pokémon’s HP is full.

effect: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.
name: mega-launcher
description: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

effect: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.
name: grass-pelt
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
name: symbiosis
description: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

effect: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.
name: tough-claws
description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into fairy moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
name: pixilate
description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
name: gooey
description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into flying moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
name: aerilate
description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

effect: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves. The second hit has half power.
name: parental-bond
description: Parent and child each attacks.

effect: Strengthens dark moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
name: dark-aura
description: Powers up each Pokémon’s Dark-type moves.

effect: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
name: fairy-aura
description: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.

effect: Makes dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types.
name: aura-break
description: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

effect: Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.
name: primordial-sea
description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

effect: Creates extremely harsh sunlight, which has all the properties of Sunny Day, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Water moves to fail.
name: desolate-land
description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

effect: Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.
name: delta-stream
description: The Pokémon changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
name: stamina
description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

effect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
name: wimp-out
description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

effect: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.
name: emergency-exit
description: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
name: water-compaction
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

effect: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.
name: merciless
description: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

effect: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form. Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.
name: shields-down
description: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
name: stakeout
description: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.

effect: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.
name: water-bubble
description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

effect: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.
name: steelworker
description: Powers up Steel-type moves.

effect: Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.
name: berserk
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

effect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
name: slush-rush
description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

effect: This Pokémon's moves do not make contact.
name: long-reach
description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

effect: Sound-based moves become Water-type.
name: liquid-voice
description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

effect: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
name: triage
description: Gives priority to a healing move.

effect: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.
name: galvanize
description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

effect: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.
name: surge-surfer
description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

effect: Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.
name: schooling
description: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

effect: Prevents the first instance of battle damage.
name: disguise
description: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

effect: Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent. Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.
name: battle-bond
description: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

effect: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.
name: power-construct
description: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.

effect: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.
name: corrosion
description: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.

effect: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.
name: comatose
description: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
name: queenly-majesty
description: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
name: innards-out
description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

effect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
name: dancer
description: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

effect: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.
name: battery
description: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.

effect: Damage from contact moves is halved. Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
name: fluffy
description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.
name: dazzling
description: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

effect: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.
name: soul-heart
description: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
name: tangling-hair
description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
name: receiver
description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
name: power-of-alchemy
description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

effect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
name: beast-boost
description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

effect: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.
name: rks-system
description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.
name: electric-surge
description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.
name: psychic-surge
description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.
name: misty-surge
description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.
name: grassy-surge
description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

effect: Other Pokémon cannot lower this Pokémon's stats.
name: full-metal-body
description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

effect: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.
name: shadow-shield
description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

effect: Reduces super-effective damage to 0.75×.
name: prism-armor
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

effect: Increases super-effective damage dealt to 1.25×.
name: neuroforce
description: Powers up moves that are super effective.
